creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: figure seen from back seated in a side chair with a very tall, narrow back, at a table; next to two windows at left with tiny diamond-shaped glass panes; another chair against wall at right with objects on seat; rather dark image
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [109a 109a]; in right margin, in pencil: [1947]; top center, in pencil: [N.684]; on back, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
provenance: Sold by Galerie Bassenge, Berlin, May 29, 2008, lot 5585, to C. G. Boerner (New York).
title: The Artist in His Mother's Room in Danzig
